name: EntityTraceLine.Builder
description: The `EntityTraceLine.Builder` class provides a fluent interface for creating `EntityTraceLine` instances with method chaining. It's the recommended way to create entity trace lines that automatically track and follow entity positions in 3D space.

methods.name: entity
methods.description: Sets the target entity to track with this trace line.

parameters.name: entity
parameters.description: The target entity to track (can be null)

methods.name: entity
methods.description: Note: This method may not be available in all versions. Use with caution.

methods.name: yOffset
methods.description: Sets the vertical offset from the entity's base position where the line should end.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Vertical offset from entity base position (positive = upward)

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the trace line color using RGB format with full alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the trace line color using RGB format with custom alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the trace line color using separate RGB values with full alpha.

methods.name: color
methods.description: Sets the trace line color using separate RGBA values.

methods.name: alpha
methods.description: Sets only the alpha transparency value while preserving RGB color.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Creates the configured `EntityTraceLine` instance without adding it to the Draw3D context.

methods.name: buildAndAdd
methods.description: Creates the configured `EntityTraceLine` instance and automatically adds it to the Draw3D context.
examples:
const entityTraceLine = draw3D.entityTraceLine()
    .entity(targetEntity)
    .color(0x00FF00)
    .yOffset(1.6)
    .buildAndAdd(); // Automatically added to Draw3D context
